EmailTemplate.name: 2018 Honeywell Supplier Summit.2018 Honeywell Supplier Summit Confirmation_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: 2018 Honeywell Supplier Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the 2018 Honeywell Supplier Summit. Please save this email for future reference. Event: 2018 Honeywell Supplier Summit
Wednesday, April 11th • Social Event: 5:30 p.m. – 7:30 p.m. • Pre-registration for the conference will be in the hotel lobby from 12:00pm to 5:00pm
Thursday, April 12th • Registration and Coffee: 7:30 a.m. – 8 a.m. • Summit Conference: 8 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Location: Tempe Mission Palms 60 East Fifth Street, Tempe, Arizona 85281 Website: www.missionpalms.com <[[http://www.missionpalms.com]]>
Reservations: 800-547-8705 (Mention the Honeywell Supplier Summit, for rate discount) Goggle Map: Map to Tempe Mission Palms <[[https://www.google.com/maps/dir/60+E+5th+St,+Tempe,+AZ+85281/@33.426047,-112.00892,12z/data=!4m8!4m7!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x872b09278b351f79:0xe845f846ddb89bf1!2m2!1d-111.9388799!2d33.4260667?hl=en]]>
Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2018/april/honeywell-supplier-summit]]> for more information.
We look forward to meeting you at the event.
Sincerely,
Dawn Palmer palmer.dawn@honeywell.com <[[mailto:palmer.dawn@honeywell.com]]>
